docs.text: enable_donation Definition bool enable_donation Declaration miner.h Description Type boolean variable used to enable/disable developer mining fee. Possible values: true: Enables the developer mining fee. bool enable_donation = true ; - false: Disbles the developer mining fee. bool enable_donation = false ; - Disables the developer mining fee. Default value: bool enable_donation = true Occurs in cpu-miner.c , miner.h , cpu-miner.c , cpu-miner.c
docs.title: enable_donation

Default value: bool enable_donation = true
